title: Vite
description: Learn how to use FlexiUI with Vite.

body.raw:
# Vite FlexiUI integrates seamlessly with Vite for blazing-fast development. ## Create a New Project Create a new Vite + React project: ```bash pnpm create vite my-app --template react-ts cd my-app ``` ## Installation Install FlexiUI and its peer dependencies: ```bash pnpm add @flexi-ui/react pnpm add -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer ``` ## Setup Tailwind CSS ### 1. Initialize Tailwind ```bash npx tailwindcss init -p ``` ### 2. Configure Tailwind Update `tailwind.config.js`: ```js /** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */ export default { content: [ './index.html', './src/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}', './node_modules/@flexi-ui/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}' ], plugins: [require('@flexi-ui/tailwind-plugin')] } ``` ### 3. Add Tailwind Directives Create or update `src/index.css`: ```css @tailwind base; @tailwind components; @tailwind utilities; ``` ## Setup FlexiUI Provider Update `src/main.tsx`: ```tsx import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom/client' import { FlexiUIProvider } from '@flexi-ui/react' import App from './App' import './index.css' ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('root')!).render( ) ``` ## Using Components Import and use FlexiUI components in your app: ```tsx import { Button } from '@flexi-ui/button' import { Input } from '@flexi-ui/input' function App() { return (

FlexiUI + Vite

) } export default App ``` ## Development Start the development server: ```bash pnpm dev ``` ## Build for Production Build your app for production: ```bash pnpm build ``` ## Vite Configuration Optimize your Vite configuration for FlexiUI: ```ts import { defineConfig } from 'vite' import react from '@vitejs/plugin-react' export default defineConfig({ plugins: [react()], optimizeDeps: { include: ['@flexi-ui/react'] } }) ```
